Plot: Larry Gopnik, a Midwestern physics teacher, watches his life unravel over multiple sudden incidents. Though seeking meaning and answers amidst his turmoils, he seems to keep sinking.
Title: A Serious Man
Actors: Michael Stuhlbarg, Richard Kind, Fred Melamed, Sari Lennick
tomatoConsensus: Blending dark humor with profoundly personal themes, the Coen brothers deliver what might be their most mature -- if not their best -- film to date.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 17 wins & 69 nominations.
